functions.author: The Coven of Tomes
pages:
§3[Splash]§1

Although the energies of the Sun and the Moon are opposites, they do come together to create magic occasionally. §3Splash§1 is one such spell. It conjures a torrent of water that blasts
§1into the victim, dealing a good amount of damage. §3Splash§1 combats fires as well, extinguishing them on contact.
